import React, { useEffect, useState, useContext, useRef } from 'react'; import AdminLayout from "../../../components/layouts/AdminLayout"; import settings from '../settings/general' import { getSetting } from '../../../_variables/ajaxVariables' import './design.scss' const design = props => { const [ state, setState ] = useState({ topBarBackgroundColor: props.design.topBarBackgroundColor || '#181818', topBarTextColor: props.design.topBarTextColor || '#fff', headerBackgroundColor: props.design.topBarTextColor || '#000', headerTextColor: props.design.topBarTextColor || '#fff', navigationBackgroundColor: props.design.topBarTextColor || '#181818', navigationTextColor: props.design.topBarTextColor || '#fff', bodyBackgroundColor: props.design.topBarTextColor || '#000', footerBackgroundColor: props.design.topBarTextColor || '#181818', }); useEffect(() => { }, []); const onChangeHandler = e => { setState({ ...state, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return (

); }; design.getInitialProps = async ({ pathname, query, req, res, err }) => { let design; const designData = await getSetting('design'); design = designData.data.setting ? designData.data.setting.data : {} return { design } } export default design;
